turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks do you want to buy it from? The closest Starbucks is at 3021 Grand Ave, in Laramie.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at 3021 Grand Ave is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size? Short, tall, grande or venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is 2% Milk okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like to add anything to that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you add hazelnut flavoring as well, if they have it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, is that all?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep! I'm ordering your grande latte with hazelnut flavor now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, how much will that be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be $4.39, including tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, and you can bill that to my card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, so the drink will be ready when I come into the shop?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, your order will be ready for pickup at the 3021 Grande Ave Starbucks shortly. The receipt will be texted to your phone.
